QuestData.Title: Trailing the Tidestone
QuestData.Description: Your quest for the Tidestone... it intrigues me. More than that, it suits my needs quite well. I have been in need of a champion for a very, very long time.$b$bIt is decided, then. I shall join you.$b$bWe will have to head east, through Nar'thalas.$b$bShall we depart?
QuestData.LogDescription: Escort Prince Farondis to the Ruins of Nar'thalas.
